overview: Shot completely online with zero physical contact and zero budget comes a film about three fresh graduates battling for the same job using their distinct personalities, wits, and accomplishments through a video call. When the strict young hiring agent starts questioning the applicants, things get a little out of hand! But in the end, the job goes to the one most deserving. Who will it be?
tagline: How far will you flaunt your medals and personality just to land a job?
title: Why Should We Hire You?
